title: If you could be omniscient, would you? - Quora

response.answer_text: We really don’t know how that would work for a human. Would it be like Evan Almighty, where he could always hear prayers in his head? If I could know answers by accessing them when and only when I pleased, then yes, I would like to be omniscient. Just so long as I could sleep and think in utter peace when I so desired.

Absolutely. I’d be able to solve every solvable issue and provide for my loved ones to the utmost. Sure I’d know every horrible thing that’s happening, but I’d also know how to compartmentalize. Besides, while I may not know the specifics, I already know that many horrible things are happening right this second and I have almost no ability to do anything about it.
